subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Smyth delivered in his first game as an Islander, but it was enough in a wrenching 3-2 overtime loss to the Blues that snapped a four-game winning streak.
snippet: Ryan Smyth delivered in his first game as an Islander, but it was enough in a wrenching 3-2 overtime loss to the Blues that snapped a four-game winning streak.
